component.name: MyScreen
component.script:
sub init() m.my_title = CreateObject("roSGNode","label") m.my_title.text = "LABEL ONE" m.my_title.height="720" m.my_title.width="1280" m.my_title.horizAlign="left" m.my_title.vertAlign="bottom" m.my_title.color = "0xFF9E00FF" m.top.appendChild(m.my_title)
content_main = CreateObject("roSGNode","ContentNode") section_a = content_main.createChild("ContentNode") section_a.CONTENTTYPE = "SECTION"
item_1 = section_a.createChild("ContentNode") item_1.title = "Item 1" item_2 = section_a.createChild("ContentNode") item_2.title = "Item 2" item_3 = section_a.createChild("ContentNode") item_3.title = "Item 3"
label_list = CreateObject("roSGNode","labellist") label_list.content = content_main label_list.translation="[200,200]"
m.top.appendChild(label_list)
m.button_group = CreateObject("roSGNode","buttongroup") m.button_group.buttons = ["Button A","Button B","Button C"] m.button_group.translation="[200,500]" m.button_group.setFocus(True) m.button_group.observeField("buttonFocused","onButtonGroupSelectionChange") m.top.appendChild(m.button_group)
m.picture = CreateObject("roSGNode","poster") m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/my_poster_image.png" m.picture.translation="[500,200]"
m.top.appendChild(m.picture)
my_overhang = CreateObject("roSGNode","overhang") my_overhang.title = "Main page" my_overhang.showClock = true m.top.appendChild(my_overhang)
main_timer = CreateObject("roSGNode","Timer") main_timer.repeat = "false" main_timer.duration= "20" main_timer.control = "start" main_timer.observeField("fire","stopTestTimer") m.top.appendChild(main_timer)
m.test_timer = CreateObject("roSGNode","Timer") m.test_timer.repeat = "true" m.test_timer.duration = "5" m.test_timer.control = "start" m.test_timer.observeField("fire","swapLabelText") m.top.appendChild(m.test_timer)
m.show_label_one = false end sub
sub stopTestTimer() print("timer has stopped") m.test_timer.control = "stop" end sub
sub swapLabelText() print("timer has fired") if m.show_label_one then m.my_title.text = "LABEL ONE" m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/my_poster_image.png" m.show_label_one = false else m.my_title.text = "LABEL TWO" m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/my_poster_image_2.png" m.show_label_one = true end if end sub
sub onButtonGroupSelectionChange() if m.button_group.buttonFocused <> invalid then focused_button = m.button_group.buttonFocused if focused_button = 0 then print "get image one" m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/poster_1.png" else if focused_button = 1 then print "get image two" m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/poster_2.png" else if focused_button = 2 then print "get image three" m.picture.uri = "pkg:/images/poster_3.png" end if end if end sub
function onKeyEvent(key as String, press as Boolean) as Boolean if press then print key end if
end function
